text: is an alpine skiing racing video game, for PlayStation 2, Arcade, then later ported to Zeebo console in 2009. Unlike the previously series (Alpine Racer and Alpine Racer 2), Alpine Racer 3 had including improved 3D graphics. Except Klonoa as a secret character. title: Alpine Racer 3
